pr_title: fix: OpenShift build resources are deleted (as long as build config manifest is available)

timeline.message:
fix: OpenShift build resources are deleted (as long as build config manifest is available)

- OpenShift builds and build configs will be deleted during oc:undeploy phase provided that
  the target/${artifactId}-is.yml file is available
- Added spring-boot-crd example to showcase a Spring Boot application that deploys Custom resources and
  queries them at runtime

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>

fix: OpenShift build resources are deleted (as long as build config manifest is available)

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>

fix: OpenShift build resources are deleted (as long as build config manifest is available)

- OpenShift builds and build configs will be deleted during oc:undeploy phase provided that

fix: OpenshiftUndeployService can retrieve image stream tags from DeploymentConfig

- Enhancement that enables OpenshiftUndeployService to retrieve IS tags and their related
  BuildConfig and Build resources from DeploymentConfig resources
  provided that their "provider" label match (i.e. "provider":"jkube"

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>

fix: OpenshiftUndeployService can retrieve image stream tags from DeploymentConfig

  BuildConfig and Build resources from DeploymentConfig resources
  provided that their "provider" label match (i.e. "provider":"jkube"

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>

timeline.bodyText: license header missing, Our license check is not working as expected. I've created #355 to fix it
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

- Enhancement that enables OpenshiftUndeployService to retrieve IS tags and their related
  BuildConfig and Build resources from DeploymentConfig resources
  provided that their "provider" label match (i.e. "provider":"jkube"
